column4: How can i see what network card and wireless chipset, number etc. my computer contains? Is there a command I can use?
dont use ls for later variables
what output you want from the script? are you using echo inside the script?
no i just want to echo the content of the script. cat /usr/local/bin/mountimm works perfectly
and what is the problem when cat is working?
that i wanted to do it like this:  $which mountimm | cat    so that i did not have to write the actual path to the bash file
oh god..thats just to indicate that its a terminal
its ridicolous to have to first write which mountimm, look at the output and manually type cat thepath
if it is in the repos (apt-cache search will tell you) then of course
